gold_ref: The state with the highest number of confirmed cases was São Paulo, followed by Rio de Janeiro

results.content: The state with the highest number of confirmed cases was São Paulo, followed by Rio de Janeiro

question: According to the study titled “The Clinical and Epidemiological Characteristics of Mpox Cases in Brazil,” what percentage of confirmed mpox cases were people living with HIV (PLWH)?
gold_ref: Of the 251 confirmed cases, 137 (54.4%) were PLWH (people living with HIV), of whom 128 (93.4%) were on ART (antiretroviral therapy)
